INSTALL File Reference

Installation instructions. More...

Detailed Description

Installation instructions.

  1. Run 'configure'.

    Use 'configure --help' to see all of the arguments configure accepts.

  2. Run 'make'.

    You can change the compiler configure will use by setting CXX when running configure. For example, to build using the C++ Sunpro compiler 

    configure CXX=CC

  3. Run 'make install'.

    After 'make install', the header files, libraries, and executables can be found under the PREFIX directory (defined by --prefix=PREFIX when running configure).

  4. Set environment variables to find the library. If the library is not installed in a system directory, set the environment variables LD_LIBRARY_PATH (or its equivalent) accordingly. You will probably want to do this in your .bashrc or .cshrc file or a file that is included by them so that these are set automatically every time you log in.

  5. bash shell users

    export EQSIMIO_DIR=/home/johndoe/eqsimio
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:${EQSIMIO_DIR}/lib

  6. tcsh shell users 
    setenv EQSIMIO_DIR /home/johndoe/eqsimio
setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH ${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:${EQSIMIO_DIR}/lib

Known Issues

None at this time.
